name: pear2/net_transmitter
description: A stream wrapper that ensures data integrity. Particularly useful for sockets.

suggest.ext-apc: This, APCu or Wincache is required for persistent connections.
suggest.ext-apcu: This, APC or Wincache is required for persistent connections.
suggest.ext-wincache: This, APC or APCu is required for persistent connections. Reccomended for Windows.
